snippet: Republicans do not believe that job-seekers who have been out of work for six months or longer deserve government assistance.
abstract: Editorial charges Senate Republicans are offering every conceivable false excuse for filibustering extension of jobless benefits; says in truth Republican Party simply does not believe that job-seekers who have been out of work for six months or longer deserve government assistance; excoriates Republicans for approving package of run-of-the-mill tax breaks while denying benefits where they are needed most.
lead_paragraph: Republicans do not believe that job-seekers who have been out of work for six months or longer deserve government assistance.

headline.main: False Reasons for Filibustering Jobless Aid
headline.print_headline: False Reasons for Filibustering Jobless Aid
